tools.name: Google
tools.description: Worker that searches results from Tavily. Useful for general search queries.

tools.name: GetCurrentTime
tools.description: Worker that returns the current time.

tools.name: GetCurrency
tools.description: Worker that retrieves currency information.

tools.name: GetExchangeRates
tools.description: Worker that retrieves exchange rates between currencies.

tools.name: LocationToLatLon
tools.description: Worker that converts a location name to latitude and longitude.

tools.name: SearchFlightLocation
tools.description: Worker that searches for flight locations.

tools.name: SearchFlightsMinPrice
tools.description: Worker that searches for the minimum price of flights.

tools.name: SearchFlights
tools.description: Worker that searches for flights.

tools.name: SearchHotelDestination
tools.description: Worker that searches for hotel destinations.

tools.name: SearchHotels
tools.description: Worker that searches for hotels.

tools.name: SearchLocation
tools.description: Worker that searches for a location.

tools.name: SunriseSunset
tools.description: Worker that retrieves sunrise and sunset times for a location.

tools.name: WeatherForecast24H
tools.description: Worker that retrieves a 24-hour weather forecast for a location.

tools.name: WeatherIndex1D
tools.description: Worker that retrieves a 1-day weather index for a location.

tools.name: WeatherRainMinute
tools.description: Worker that retrieves minute-by-minute rain information for a location.

tools.name: FanFavorites
tools.description: Worker that retrieves fan favorite movies or series from IMDb.

tools.name: SearchIMDB
tools.description: Worker that searches for information on IMDb.

tools.name: UpcomingMovies
tools.description: Worker that retrieves upcoming movies from IMDb.

tools.name: WeekTop10
tools.description: Worker that retrieves the top 10 movies or series of the week from IMDb.

tools.name: WhatsStreaming
tools.description: Worker that retrieves information about what's streaming on IMDb.
